price: 18. Samada arrinkaa darti la dildillaaci. Yabooha (Alle) waa mid abad fula.
arabic: ٱلسَّمَآءُ مُنفَطِرُۢ بِهِۦۚ كَانَ وَعۡدُهُۥ مَفۡعُولًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: al-samāu munfaṭirun bihi kāna waʿduhu mafʿūlan
